college tuition coming due, the Bungo Man has no need for the Nihonto 
Zuikan complete set ( koto and shinto revised ed ) by Ginsaku Kataoka 
which features other " better class " swords.
I was told the going price for the set is about 1300.
I am asking 1200 + shipping  ( actual cost, but could runs to about 
50+, the books are heavy ).
 I will be attending the Chicago show this coming week and buyer is 
welcome to pick them up at the show, in that case shipping is free.

At the moment I will limit the sale to USA only as shipping  heavy 
books oversea  is a bit$#@ and I don't need extra headache about 
tracking, insurance, how come it takes so long etc.etc.
Please contact off list........... danke.
p.s.  condition is very good, the original cardboard case are  a bit 
worn but not torn, some old grease stains resembling double 
cheeseburger .
milt  ( sujikabuto@... )
